item.description:
I am running this event.  I am busy putting it together and that is why I have not had time to play golf.  Looking for all golfers good or bad.  Need money and head count by June 25.Get form at http://www.survivorsofhomicide.com/documents/SOH%20Golf%20Reg.pdf 

9 holes) Tee Off Time:  9:00 am, scramble stylePrizes for 1st.,

 2nd place and more

12:00 pm social time, followed by lunch/speakers/raffle/cash bar

9 holes, cart and buffet - $70.00 per person

buffet only - $30.00 per person

Payments are tax deductible.

Also looking for sponsors.

Please complete registration form and return along with your payment by June 15th.  Form and additional information  is located on our home page, under more tab and then files

Thanks for your support!
item.name: Save the date! Survivors of Homicide Golf Tournament
